alert.note: Alert for Alleghany (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 5:54PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Alleghany County in west central Virginia and southeastern Greenbrier Counties in southeastern West Virginia through 630 PM EDT... At 554 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Renick, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... White Sulphur Springs... Renick... Neola... Falling Spring... Lewisburg Airport... Alvon... and Maxwelton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
